description: Master the momentum and physics of a simplified side-scrolling world.
rationale: This game focuses on the core platforming mechanics of momentum, jumping height, and enemy collision. It provides a clean environment for RL agents to learn the relationship between horizontal velocity and jump distance, which is a fundamental challenge in platforming AI.
details: The game is a 2D side-scrolling platformer. The player controls a character that must navigate a level from left to right. Key features include: 1. Physics-based movement with acceleration and friction. 2. Variable jump height depending on how long the jump key is held. 3. Gravity constants that affect descent speed. 4. Enemy entities (Goomba-style) that move back and forth and damage the player on side contact but are defeated when jumped upon. 5. Gold coins for scoring. 6. A goal flag at the end of the level to trigger completion.

technical_specs.state_space: Player position, velocity, enemy positions, nearest platform coordinates

how_to_play: Goal: Reach the flag at the right end of the level while maximizing score. Controls: Left/Right Arrow keys to move, Spacebar to jump. Score: +100 for each coin collected, +500 for defeating an enemy, +1000 for reaching the flag. Penalty: -1000 if the player touches an enemy from the side or falls into a pit (Game Over).
